channel.title: 317 project insanity commands.java adding yell command
channel.description:
I actually need help with more than just a yell... Like I wanted to add a donator Island.. Maybe a staff area... A really good yell command obviously... Everytime I find a command to use for anything such as yell I add it.. I always get 1 error.. I'm going upload my commands.java if anyone can add at least a yell command for me I will be very grateful!
Thanks! <3
my commands download link. http://up.ht/1uJoobp

item.title: 317 project insanity commands.java adding yell command
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Amber19, post:3, topic:547680”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666584.msg4456884#msg4456884 date=1415410767]
This isn’t what the help section is for…
We are here to help you where you’re stuck.
We are not here to do everything for you.

If you get errors, show us the errors along with the code either on pastebin or by putting it in code tags.
And telling us more information about your server helps too.
[/quote]

I said it would be appreciated… because I’m really bad at coding like Idk why I keep getting the errors

Well totally off topic of what I need help with I also want to know why when ever I use deathlypvpz v3 source or hybrid pvp v3 or anything above 317 I get a lag every 5 seconds like when I’m walking you can just see me lagging same with npcs… It’s really annoying been trying fix that for months…

As for the error I get: http://prntscr.com/544qi1[/quote]

[quote=“Amber19, post:3, topic:547680”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666584.msg4456884#msg4456884 date=1415410767]
This isn’t what the help section is for…
We are here to help you where you’re stuck.
We are not here to do everything for you.

If you get errors, show us the errors along with the code either on pastebin or by putting it in code tags.
And telling us more information about your server helps too.
[/quote]

I said it would be appreciated… because I’m really bad at coding like Idk why I keep getting the errors

Well totally off topic of what I need help with I also want to know why when ever I use deathlypvpz v3 source or hybrid pvp v3 or anything above 317 I get a lag every 5 seconds like when I’m walking you can just see me lagging same with npcs… It’s really annoying been trying fix that for months…

As for the error I get: http://prntscr.com/544qi1[/quote]
Proving why we are here to help. You don’t know what you’re doing. If we just fix everything for you, you aren’t going to learn.

From what I see, you have a bunch of commands outside of the class, and all the methods…

Here is how your file is structured.

// imports

// Class declaration (public class Commands implements PacketType { )

// Process packet method (public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) { )
//  >> select command method based on player rights

// Owner commands method (public static void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {)

// Admin commands method (public static void adminCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {)

// Mod commands method (public static void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {)

// player commands method (public static void playerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {)

// test commands method (public static void testCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {)

// End class ( } )
// a bunch of other commands that shouldn't be there.

Read full topic
